full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### F2915-230507_B - Medium Truck with Enclosed Service Body
#### Brief Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) hereby announces the reissue of a solicitation of offers for the procurement of a Medium Truck with Enclosed Service Body. This solicitation cancels and supersedes previous solicitation number WS4218841382, which held a closing date of November 22, 2023 at 14:00 EST.

#### Important Details

* Solicitation Number: WS4218841382-Doc4341652610
* Date of Publication: December 6, 2023
* Closing Date: January 3, 2024, at 14:00 EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: Upon award of contract

#### Tender Information

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5 Canada
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

#### Trade Agreements

This solicitation supports the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

#### Regions of Delivery

Delivery will occur within the National Capital Region (NCR).

#### Contact Information

For further information, please contact:
Valerie Matheson, SPAC/PSPC
valerie.matheson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Additional Resources

Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18208032?extsite=MTgyMDgwMzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Attachments: None

#### Important Notes

A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to Offeror's who offered on the previous solicitation. Offerors are responsible for ensuring they receive all necessary information before the closing date.
